message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a remarkable value. I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $100. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll consider taking advantage of it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I'm looking for something within my budget. Would you be able to offer the product at $90?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In an effort to accommodate your needs while still valuing our product, I am willing to offer the product at a slightly reduced price of $95. I hope this meets your expectations and allows you to consider our product more seriously.
I appreciate your willingness to adjust, Alice. Considering my budget, would it be possible to offer the product at $88?

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I'm glad we're finding common ground. To better align with your budgetary considerations, I propose a final offer of $89 for our product. I believe this is a fair compromise, allowing you to acquire the quality and value you seek without exceeding your budget.
